events.message: I received my order today but unfortunately the item has multiple scratches and looks damaged. I was expecting a brand new product, but this one seems faulty.
The reported issue has been labelled as Product Defect based on the customer's description of damage and scratches.
An agent specialized in product defects has been assigned to handle the case and assist the customer with their issue.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear your product arrived in poor condition. I’m here to help resolve the issue for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and damage on the item so we can better assess the problem and find the best solution?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches on the surface and damage to the packaging. Please let me know how we can proceed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement item free of charge or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option suits you best.
I would like to receive a replacement, thank you for resolving this so quickly and offering clear options.
We have processed the replacement order and you should receive the new item within 5 business days. A return label for the damaged product was sent to your email.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement and that everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since we have not heard back after our follow-up and the replacement was delivered, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
